hero.name: Marcos Infante Viñuela
hero.subtitle: Computer Engineer · Front-end Developer · Data Engineer
hero.description: I’m a computer engineer who enjoys building expressive web experiences and intelligent systems. I spend my free time climbing and exploring nature — the same curiosity and balance I bring to my work. Technically, I focus on creating data-driven applications with React, TypeScript, and Python, integrating AI to automate and enhance real-world workflows.
hero.list1: Python, TypeScript, React, FastAPI, Docker, Airflow, LangChain, OpenAI API
hero.list2: Focused on AI integration, data automation, and motion-driven user experiences
hero.list3: Graduated in Computer Engineering ·  Based in the Netherlands · Open for collaborations

quote.text: The only constant in life is change, never stop moving.
